rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes control areas factually without high-potency language.
No moderate verbs paired with explicit scale/impact information.
No question is present in the text.
The segment reports action taken (control areas were set up) but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation about risk, cases, or spread.
Describes implemented control measures ('Control areas were set up') as safeguards without linking to current calm/safety.
